All the data in python will be in private heap

all objects like lists,tuples,sets, all are stored permanently in heap memory
who does this allocation - will be done by python memory manager (PVM)
1. role is to give autority for allocation of the memory
2.Raw memory allocator- will deal with "actual" physical allocation of the memory

kind of malloc in c

c is good in memory management

calloc and realloc and free kind of c in python

Stack memory    -for loop , the iteration variable

PyMem_api       - to call memory management operation in python

must read PEP
